item.title: Lisp as an Alternative to Java
item.description: Here’s more on LISP… one more article from Peter Norvig.. This is another of his on my blog… Look at the follow-up study document.. its good… Update: - [2010-10-11 Mon] - Removed the article’s copy.

item.title: Popularly Unpopular??
item.description: Popular opinion isn’t everything….. Its not necessary that we always go with the popular opinion, or take that option which most people endorse.. here’s a case in point… an article by Paul Graham..(You can also read it @ http://www.paulgraham.com/iflisp.html) Update - [2010-10-11 Mon] - Removed the copy of the article.
